name: Cowboy Troy
description: '''Troy Lee Coleman III''' (born December 18, 1970), better known by his stage name '''Cowboy Troy''', is an American [[country rap]] artist. He has released seven studio albums and one EP, including three releases on [[Warner Records|Warner Bros. Records]], and has charted twice on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' country singles charts. He is a former member of the [[MuzikMafia]], an aggregation of singers and songwriters formed by [[John Rich]] of [[Big & Rich]]. His major-label debut album ''[[Loco Motive (album)|Loco Motive]]'' included the charted single "I Play Chicken with the Train".
